text: $NVAX -2% [Citi started coverage of Novavax with a Sell rating and a $6 price target. They recognize vaccines as essential for global health, but believe Novavax's focus on respiratory vaccines, declining vaccination rates, and uncertain healthcare policies make success difficult.]
